titleStmt.title: Three sermons vpon the Passion, Resurrection and Ascension of Our Sauior preached at Oxford, by Barten Holyday, now archdeacon of Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Holyday, Barten, 1593-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be sold at his shop at Saint Austines Gate in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
The component sermons each have divisional title pages; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
